articles.title: The Google Pixel 5a Isn’t Coming To Australia - Gizmodo Australia
articles.description: Over the weekend there were reports that the Pixel 5a had been cancelled. It's not true, but it's still bad news for Australians.
articles.content:
Over the weekend there were reports that the Pixel 5a had been cancelled due to global chip shortages. It’s not true, but it’s still bad news for Australians.

articles.title: Spiral Blue secures satellite partner ahead of launch - Australian Defence Magazine
articles.description: Australian startup Spiral Blue will partner with SatRevolution to host its Space Edge Zero computers onboard two satellites ahead of a launch onboard Virgin Orbit’s LauncherOne rocket.
articles.content:
SEZ hardware has arrived in Poland and is currently undergoing final integration with these satellites.
Spiral Blues SEZ, is a prototype computer designed to allow in-space processing of satellite i… [+2014 chars]

articles.author: Gabe Gurwin
articles.title: Epic Games Is Losing An Absurd Amount Of Money On Exclusive Games - GameSpot
articles.description: The company appears set to lose around $300 million to pay for Epic Games Store exclusives.
articles.content: Epic Games seems to understand that, given the lead Steam had and its massive current user-base, the only way it can be a viable competitor is to have games that you can't play on Steam--at least for… [+2067 chars]
